20110125033102.000|20110125033103.000|CC1|CAPTURE OPRAH MEETING HER HALF

20110125033108.000|20110125033109.000|CC1|PATRICIA WHO SHARES THE SAME    
20110125033109.000|20110125033111.000|CC1|MOTHER AS OPRAH WAS PUT UP FOR  
20110125033111.000|20110125033112.000|CC1|ADOPTION AT BIRTH IN 1963 E WHEN
20110125033112.000|20110125033115.000|CC1|OPRAH WAS 9 AND LIVING WITH HER 
20110125033115.000|20110125033115.000|CC1|FATHER.                         
20110125033115.000|20110125033117.000|CC1|PATRICIA HAS KEPT THIS FAMILY   
20110125033117.000|20110125033118.000|CC1|SECRET SINCE DISCOVERING IT FOR 
20110125033118.000|20110125033121.000|CC1|HERSELF IN 2007 BUT TODAY, OPRAH
20110125033121.000|20110125033122.000|CC1|EMOTIONALLY INTRODUCED HER TO   
20110125033122.000|20110125033127.000|CC1|THE WORLD.

20110125033128.000|20110125033134.000|CC1|ABOUT THIS STORY.

20110125033137.000|20110125033140.000|CC1|FEW TIMES SINCE I'VE BEEN

20110125033157.000|20110125033158.000|CC1|ADOPTION RECORDS, PATRICIA ASKED
20110125033158.000|20110125033200.000|CC1|THE AGENCY TO PUT HER IN CONTACT
20110125033200.000|20110125033201.000|CC1|WITH HER BIRTH MOM.
